categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A battle at the planet Thyferra was an engagement in the New Republic liberation campaign after the Battle of Endor.
After the battle in the very close Yag'Dhul system, the New Republic forces decided to continue their progression by liberating Thyferra.

Thyferra was freed but the New Republic didn't settle on the planet which stayed officially neutral in the war. Thyferra was in fact in trouble due to significant tensions between Humans and Vratix and between the Xucphra and Zaltin Corporation.
